name: Meteor Run
overview: Game description: Meteor Run is game designed and coded by Tony Brantner and published by Ion International in Ahoy! 1986/08 (Issue #32) This is a horizontal scrolling shooter in which you have to shoot down meteors. Obviously partially borrowing from games like asteroids, but also defender as you have to pick up energy cells to keep your lasers from running out. If your energy runs out, you lose a life, but you also lose a life if you collide with a meteor.
